# love see [amur](amur.html)

ἀγαπάω agapáō  
а-гәаҧха-ра (a-g°apxa-ra, “to like, wish, love”) гуапэ (g°āpă), Kabardian гуапэ (g°āpă, “nice, cordial, pleasurable”),  
all three containing the Northwest Caucasian word for “heart”, Adyghe гу g°  

https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%D8%AD_%D8%A8_%D8%A8#Arabic
